name: StaticWaves Forge - AI 3D Asset Generation
description: Complete StaticWaves Forge platform with unified boot system. Includes Web GUI, API backend, and asset generation pipeline.
startScript:
#!/bin/bash
cd /workspace

if [ ! -d 'staticwaves-forge' ]; then
  git clone -b claude/ai-3d-asset-engine-Q6XOw https://github.com/ssiens-oss/ssiens-oss-static_pod.git staticwaves-forge
fi

cd staticwaves-forge/staticwaves-forge
bash start-unified.sh start

# Keep container alive
tail -f /tmp/staticwaves-logs/*.log

## Management

SSH into your pod and run:

```bash
# View status
bash /workspace/staticwaves-forge/staticwaves-forge/start-unified.sh status

# View logs
bash /workspace/staticwaves-forge/staticwaves-forge/start-unified.sh logs

# Restart all services
bash /workspace/staticwaves-forge/staticwaves-forge/start-unified.sh restart

# Stop all services
bash /workspace/staticwaves-forge/staticwaves-forge/start-unified.sh stop
```

## Troubleshooting

If services don't start:

1. Check logs: `tail -f /tmp/staticwaves-logs/*.log`
2. Restart: `bash start-unified.sh restart`
3. Manual start: Navigate to `/workspace/staticwaves-forge/staticwaves-forge` and run `bash start-unified.sh`
